name: Gooey.AI
description: Gooey.AI is a low-code AI orchestration platform that simplifies the integration and deployment of generative AI workflows for developers and businesses.
longDescription: Gooey.AI is a low-code platform designed to make generative AI accessible by enabling developers and teams to discover, customize, and deploy AI workflows with ease. It integrates with leading AI models from providers like OpenAI, Google, Anthropic, and open-source options, offering a unified billing system and hot-swappable model access. The platform supports global language capabilities and ensures data privacy through secure, on-premise hosting options. Its mission is to empower organizations to harness AI efficiently, turning one-time AI investments into reusable assets for measurable value. By fostering an open-source AI ecosystem, Gooey.AI accelerates innovation and supports impactful projects like Farmer.CHAT, a multilingual WhatsApp bot for farmers. It caters to developers who code quickly and teams focused on proving ROI through AI-driven solutions.
features: Low-code AI workflows enable rapid creation and deployment of AI-powered applications without extensive coding expertise.
Integration with multiple AI models, including OpenAI, Google, and Mistral, allows users to select the best model for their needs.
Global language support provides speech recognition, text-to-speech, and translation for over 1,000 languages, enhancing accessibility.
Secure data handling with PII hashing ensures user data privacy and compliance with SOC2 Type II standards.
Customizable Copilot integrations, like Farmer.CHAT, enable tailored AI solutions for specific industries such as agriculture.
Unified billing simplifies access to multiple AI providers, eliminating the need for multiple accounts and subscriptions.
Self-hostable web widgets and APIs allow businesses to embed AI functionalities into their apps or websites seamlessly.
Community-driven workflow library offers pre-built AI recipes that users can fork, tweak, and share for collaborative innovation.
On-premise hosting options provide enterprises with secure, private AI workflow execution for sensitive data.
Usability testing tools enable quick deployment and analysis of customer behavior, feedback, and retention metrics.

faqs.question: What is Gooey.AI?
faqs.answer: Gooey.AI is a low-code AI orchestration platform that simplifies the integration and deployment of generative AI workflows, supporting a wide range of AI models and global languages.

faqs.question: Does Gooey.AI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Gooey.AI provides a free plan with 500 credits upon sign-up, no credit card required, allowing users to explore its features with limited usage.

faqs.question: What types of AI models can I use with Gooey.AI?
faqs.answer: Gooey.AI supports private models from OpenAI, Google, Anthropic, and Mistral, as well as custom open-source models like SEALION and AfroLLAMA.

faqs.question: Can I use Gooey.AI for multilingual applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, Gooey.AI offers speech recognition, text-to-speech, and translation for over 1,000 languages, making it ideal for global applications.

faqs.question: Is Gooey.AI suitable for enterprise use?
faqs.answer: Gooey.AI provides on-premise hosting and SOC2 Type II compliance, ensuring secure and private AI workflows for enterprises.

faqs.question: How does Gooey.AI support developers?
faqs.answer: Developers can access a Python and TypeScript SDK, forkable workflows, and a community library to build and customize AI applications quickly.

faqs.question: What is Farmer.CHAT, and how is it related to Gooey.AI?
faqs.answer: Farmer.CHAT is a multilingual WhatsApp bot built using Gooey.AIâ€™s Copilot workflow, supporting farmers in Ethiopia, India, and Kenya with agricultural advice.

faqs.question: Can I integrate Gooey.AI into my existing applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, Gooey.AI offers self-hostable web widgets and APIs to embed AI functionalities into apps, websites, or platforms like WhatsApp and Slack.
